<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = It-&gt;second; <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>; <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Caller)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RootToLeafPath = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the root.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = RootToLeafPath.begin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PathRoot = &#42;It++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RootIt =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">find&#95;if</a>(Roots, &#91;PathRoot&#93;(TrieNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;Func == PathRoot; &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;ve not seen this root before, remember it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  TrieNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RootIt == Roots.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    NodeStorage.emplace&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = &amp;NodeStorage.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Func = PathRoot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    Roots.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = &#42;RootIt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now traverse the path, re-creating if necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It != RootToLeafPath.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeFuncID = &#42;It++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CalleeIt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">find&#95;if</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Callees, &#91;NodeFuncID&#93;(TrieNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">      return N-&gt;Func == NodeFuncID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CalleeIt == <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Callees.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeStorage.emplace&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewNode = &amp;NodeStorage.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewNode-&gt;Func = NodeFuncID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewNode-&gt;Caller = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Callees.push&#95;back(NewNode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = NewNode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = &#42;CalleeIt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At this point, Node &#42;must&#42; be pointing at the leaf.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Func == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.front());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;ID == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;ID = NextID++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    PathIDMap.insert(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;ID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;ID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DataOrError = readData(Extractor, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The implementation of the algorithm re-creates the execution of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the functions based on the trace data. To do this, we set up a number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// data structures to track the execution context of every thread in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Trace.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Profile::ThreadID, std::vector&lt;StackEntry&gt;</a>&gt; ThreadStacks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Profile::ThreadID, DenseMap&lt;Profile::PathID, Profile::Data&gt;</a>&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">      ThreadPathData;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  We then do a pass through the Trace to account data on a per-thread-basis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">      TSD.push&#95;back(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.TSC, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.FuncId&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Exits cause some accounting to happen, based on the state of the stack.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each function we pop off the stack, we take note of the path and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// record the cumulative state for this path. As we&#39;re doing this, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!TSD.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InternedPath = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.internPath(Path);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++TPD.CallCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;ve matched the corresponding entry event for this function,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Consider the intermediate times and the cumulative tree time</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
